mean_cn: n.彩票；碰运气的事，难算计的事
mean_en: a way of raising money for a government, charity, etc. by selling tickets that have different numbers on them that people have chosen. Numbers are then chosen by chance and the people who have those numbers on their tickets win prizes.
sentence: He was checking numbers on the TV to see if he would win the lottery.
sentence_trans: 他当时在核对电视上的开奖数字，看是否能中彩票。
